title: Marketing Ain't Easy: It's Three Simple Steps: A Comprehensive Approach to Engaging Your Ideal Customer Today
description: Marketing is simple… but that doesn’t mean it’s easy. Lots of things in life can be difficult but at the same time, not complicated or complex - like running a marathon for my bucket list. It was incredibly difficult but it was simple, one foot in front of the other. Finishing college is difficult and complicated. Dating is difficult and complicated. Marketing ain’t easy, it’s difficult. But marketing is not complicated; it’s three simple steps. You just have to take your time with them and put in some effort.Marketing Ain't Easy is a guide to creating a full marketing plan that any marketing professional or business owner can implement today.
author: Jonathan Austin Rizzo
